27fa0f96dfc03bb1f2bebd6fee16f716 (12:07): scheduling has been a pita to deploy on different OS

27fa0f96dfc03bb1f2bebd6fee16f716 (12:07): especially if you have multiple somewhat separat apps, that are supposed to run as a single user in the OS
443a9547033ec9d695ae9d29e8df98b1 (12:07): yeah, i hope they make their scheduler implementation better than the one in oracle
